alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 10:53PM CST until January 28 at 7:12PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Monticello affecting Lawrence County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River near Monticello. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon to Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Water inundates some lowland and agricultural land near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 15.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 23.0 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Pearl River Monticello 22.0 15.7 Wed 10 pm CS 22.9 23.0 22.1 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 1100 AM CST.
